subject: Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Bradley Wiggins held on to win the Critérium du Dauphiné in the Alps, displaying his strong form in the mountains just weeks away before the start of the Tour de France.
snippet: Bradley Wiggins held on to win the Critérium du Dauphiné in the Alps, displaying his strong form in the mountains just weeks away before the start of the Tour de France.
